page.title: 11Water Sports at West Bay.
page.content: Along the coast at West Bay and at Eype the two most popular pastimes are swimming and fishing, but sailing, water-skiing and snorkelling have also become popular in recent years. The Chesil beach is reputed to be one of the finest fishing beaches in the whole of the British Isles. The shingle beach stretches in a gentle curve for about nineteen miles from East Beach, West Bay, to Portland. It is fishable at any state of the tide and many different fish are caught including cod, whiting, mackerel, silver bass and pollack. As well as shore fishing a number of boats at West Bay are used for taking anglers out for deep sea fishing trips.
